q: Romeo brand will also have returned to the U.S. market after 17 years. Sergio Marchionne said Fiat could expand beyond metro areas in a year or so, but he has greater aspirations for Alfa. Alfa will be a bigger brand than Fiat, Sergio Marchionne said.`` It is my sincere hope it plays in a much bigger box.'' The Democrats, who used similar messaging leading up to the healthcare reform repeal vote, are trying to paint Republican healthcare efforts as a distraction from creating jobs. I do not understand how this Republican Congress can move from that mandate to create jobs, to create opportunities in this country, toward how we undermine women's reproductive health, said Barbara Boxer Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.). at Mr. Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq.`` Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody,'' Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.[ CIA Director President Bush ] Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld -- who does reveal that former President Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11-- argues that removing Saddam Hussein was the right thing to do.
